subject: Re: SPRING SALE - AUSSIE SKIPS UPDATE

full_threads.body:
Hi Nansi,

Thanks for your patience and for checking in so early this morning.

Apologies for the delay, the changes needed to be pushed manually, and we wanted to make sure everything was checked properly so the site wouldn’t break.

I can confirm the updates have now been pushed live on the site.
https://www.aussieindustries.com.au/

Let me know if there’s anything else or any tweaks , always happy to help.

Hi guys
I've checked online it 6:15am Monday morning and nothing has been changed online for the sale yet.

Can someone pls confirm the changes asap please?



Nansi Philips

Hi Nansi,

Happy Friday, and thanks for sending through the assets!

We’ve set everything up on staging for your review:
  • Website banner:
  • Staging site: View here
    → Would love your confirmation that the artwork and placement look right to you
  • Pricing update
    https://www.stg-aussieindustriesnew-stg.kinsta.cloud/price-list/
    → When you have a moment, take a look and let us know if the pricing and discount scope look good on your end. Once you’re happy, we’ll get it ready for the live site
  • Deactivation timing: Noted on this. We will deactivate the spring sale and revert to standard at midnight on 30 September 2025.

Once you’ve had a chance to review and approve, we’ll go ahead and push everything live.

If you’d like to tweak the banner or copy, just give us a shout, we’re happy to jump in.

Hi Nansi,

Hope you are having a lovely Friday.

Exciting to hear about your upcoming Spring Sale!

Quick favor—would it be possible to get a flattened version of the image from your design team via Figma?
It looks like the current file has separated layers, and we’re having trouble exporting it as a single image for the website upload.

Looking forward to your response very soon.
Hey @joy - custom project, we can assign to @adriane as well if dev is busy, I think he can do this 🙏

Hi WolfIQ
Please see below instructions for the upcoming Spring Sale update:
  1. Website Banners
    • Update the top banner and the front image on the website.
    • Use the assets provided in the attached Figma link:
      Figma File Selection.

https://www.figma.com/design/IMEcQ5HBfLx0lHKgWEalff/Aussie-Industries?node-id=4138-11282&t=lBu8ULUs0hzmvSW1-4

  1. Pricing Update
    • As of 1st September, pricing should reflect a 5% discount across all skip bin waste products (price slash).
    • Please ensure the discount is applied consistently.
  2. Deactivation Timeline
    • The Spring Sale must be deactivated at midnight on 30 September 2025.
    • Please ensure banners, artworks, and pricing revert to standard at that time.
If anything is unclear or if you anticipate any issues with the transition, please let me know.
Thank you for helping ensure this campaign runs smoothly.

Nansi Philips ​​​​
Operations Manager
